title: Textile, 17th–18th century
medium:
Medium: linen, wool
Technique: plain weave foundation (linen) with supplementary warp patterning (wool)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 42.5 x 37.5 cm (16 3/4 x 14 3/4 in.)
description: Vertical stripe: wide bands of ivory patterned in yellow and green with a curving vine on which birds are perched, alternating with narrow stripes with small, regular rosettes in red and purple.

Textile, 17th–18th century.Medium: linen, wool
Technique: plain weave foundation (linen) with supplementary warp patterning (wool). 1972-36-6.
